checkNoMatch.description: No DOM elements matching the provided CSS selectors were found
checkNoMatch.message: Unable to find expected element(s) in the page.

checkTimeout.message: Expected element(s) has not been added to the page.

defaultReportMessage.description: The default message displayed in the report form
defaultReportMessage.message:
Dear Ninja Cookie support,

A cookie banner appeared in a tab where Ninja Cookie is not running.
Here are the technical information you need :
    URL: $URL$
    Version: $VERSION$
    User-Agent: $USERAGENT$

Please have a look at it.
Regards,

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/74.0.3729.131 Safari/537.36

defaultStatus.description: The status text when Ninja Cookie is not running in a tab.
defaultStatus.message: Ninja Cookie is not running on this tab.

defaultStatusDesc.description: The description of the status when Ninja Cookie is not running.
defaultStatusDesc.message:
On special pages (such as settings page, etc.) Ninja Cookie is not needed and thus not running.
If you just installed/activated Ninja Cookie, reloading the page might help.

disabledReportMessage.description: The default disabled message displayed in the report form
disabledReportMessage.message:
Dear Ninja Cookie support,

An error occured in a disabled tab.
Here are the technical information you need :
    URL: $URL$
    Version: $VERSION$
    User-Agent: $USERAGENT$

Please have a look at it.
Regards,

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/74.0.3729.131 Safari/537.36

disabledStatus.message: Ninja Cookie is disabled for this tab.

disabledStatusDesc.message: Ninja Cookie is currently disabled. You can turn it on using the 'Enable Ninja Cookie' button.

doneReportMessage.description: The default done message displayed in the report form
doneReportMessage.message:
Dear Ninja Cookie support,

I came across a website with a badly setup cookie banner.
Here are the technical information you need :
    URL: $URL$
    Version: $VERSION$
    User-Agent: $USERAGENT$
    Matched rule(s): $MATCHED$

Please have a look at it.
Regards,

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/74.0.3729.131 Safari/537.36

doneStatus.description: The text status when Ninja Cookie has correctly setup a cookie banner. > Green Dot
doneStatus.message: The cookie banner has been setup by Ninja Cookie.

doneStatusAlt.description: The done status alternative text > Green dot

doneStatusDesc.description: The description of the status when Ninja Cookie has correctly setup a cookie banner. > Green Dot
doneStatusDesc.message: Cookies that are not essential for the proper functioning of the website have been refused by Ninja Cookie in the cookie banner.

extensionDescription.message: Opt out of non-essential cookies and automatically remove cookie popups.

externalReportMessage.description: The default External message displayed in the report form
externalReportMessage.message:

An error occured in an external tab.
Here are the technical information you need :

    Version: $VERSION$
    User-Agent: $USERAGENT$

Please have a look at it.
Regards,

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/74.0.3729.131 Safari/537.36

externalStatus.message: This tab has been opened by Ninja Cookie to setup the cookie banner of another tab.

externalStatusDesc.message:
Ninja Cookie opened this tab because it needs to setup the cookie banner of the site you were visiting.
This tab will be closed automatically when the setup is complete.

externalTimeout.message: External window has been running for too long.

externalWindowUnloaded.message: External window has been unloaded too early.

failedStatus.description: The failed reason text > Red dot
failedStatus.message: An error has occurred. The cookie banner setup has not been fully done on this page.

failedStatusAlt.description: The failed status alternative text > Red dot

failedStatusDesc.description: The description of the text displayed when an error has occured. > Red dot
failedStatusDesc.message:
Ninja Cookie has detected one or more cookie banners on this page but has not been able to fully set them up.
You can report this error by using the 'Report a bug' button.

holidayChristmas.message: Happy holiday season and a merry Christmas!

infoStatusAlt.description: The info status alternative text. > Yellow dot

infoStatusDesc.message: The cookie banner doesn't allow any settings and Ninja Cookie couldn't set it up. It has been hidden.

internalFrameUnloaded.message: Internal frame has been unloaded too early.

internalTimeout.message: Internal frame has been running for too long.

matchedReportMessage.description: The default matched message displayed in the report form
matchedReportMessage.message:
Dear Ninja Cookie support,

I came across a website with a never-ending cookie banner setup.
Here are the technical information you need :
    URL: $URL$
    Version: $VERSION$
    User-Agent: $USERAGENT$
    Matched rule(s): $MATCHED$

Please have a look at it.
Regards,

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/74.0.3729.131 Safari/537.36

matchedStatus.description: The status text when Ninja Cookie is setting up cookie banners. > Blue dot
matchedStatus.message: The cookie banner is being setup on this webpage.

matchedStatusDesc.description: The description of the status when Ninja Cookie is setting up cookie banners. > Blue dot
matchedStatusDesc.message: Ninja Cookie has detected one or more cookie banners on this webpage and is setting them up.

messagePremiumPromotionAfterAWeek.message:
If you want Ninja Cookie to ignore a cookie banner on a specific website, you can do so by becoming a Ninja Cookie Premium user.

By doing so, you will be supporting the development and improvement of the project. And you can chose the amount of your Premium subscription based on what you can and want to give!

messagePremiumPromotionEveryMonth.message:
Did you checked out the Ninja Cookie Premium features? You could, for example, disable this sticker. Check them all out!

You can chose the amount of your Premium subscription based on what you can and want to give!

messageUpdate.message:
Great news : Ninja Cookie is growing up and is now offering you new features by becoming Premium!

You can, for example, disable this sticker or whitelist websites. You can chose the amount of your Ninja Cookie Premium subscription based on what you can and want to give us.

messageWelcome.message:
Hi, I'm Ninja Cookie! I'll be at your side when you browse the web. I'll take care of cookie banners for you by refusing the use of cookies that aren't essential to the proper functioning of websites.

You'll find me in the toolbar of your browser, next to the other extensions. There you'll find options and more information about cookie banners I'll setup. You can also use extra features by becoming Premium for the amount of your choice!

Click me, and I'll disappear!

pendingReportMessage.description: The default pending message displayed in the report form
pendingReportMessage.message:
Dear Ninja Cookie support,

I came across a website with a cookie banner.
Here are the technical information you need :
    URL: $URL$
    Version: $VERSION$
    User-Agent: $USERAGENT$

Please have a look at it.
Regards,

userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/74.0.3729.131 Safari/537.36

pendingStatus.description: The status text when Ninja Cookie has not detected any cookie banners. > No dot
pendingStatus.message: No cookie banner has been detected on this webpage.

pendingStatusDesc.description: The description of the status when Ninja Cookie has not detected any cookie banners.
pendingStatusDesc.message: Ninja Cookie didn't detect any cookie banners on this webpage.

popupDesc.message: Do you think something is wrong, report a bug and we'll work on it!

popupDisableHostname.description: The disable option for a specific website

popupDisableTab30min.message: Disable on this tab for 30 minutes

popupStatsDesc.description: The message explaining stats and saving factor
popupStatsDesc.message:
The Ninja is setting up cookie banners faster than most. In average, it would take $FACTOR$ times longer to do it manually.
The Ninja spent $TIME$ $UNIT$ working on your cookie banners, but you saved more time than that!

popupSubscriptionSubtitle.description: The message shown under the subscription button
popupSubscriptionSubtitle.message: Subscribe to Ninja Cookie Premium features from $AMOUNT$/month!

popupTweeterContent.description: The prefilled content of a Tweet
popupTweeterContent.message: $ACCOUNT$ has rejected the use of non-essential cookies and removed $COUNT$ cookie pop-ups for me, saving me $TIME$ $UNIT$! Go check #NinjaCookie out here https://ninja-cookie.com/ and install it, it's free!

reportUrl.description: The URL of the report form

scriptError.message: An error occured during script execution.

scriptRunUntrusted.description: The message displayed before running script from untrusted origin
scriptRunUntrusted.message:
A script from untrusted source asks to be run for Ninja Cookie to complete the cookie banner setup.

Running untrusted script can be dangerous. Do you want to continue ?

Content: '$CONTENT$'
Origin: $URL$

scriptTimeout.message: Script has been running for too long.

scriptUnauthorized.message: Untrusted script has not been authorized to run.

settingsABListsCustomAlreadyExists.description: The error message shown when a custom Ad Blocker list is already in the default lists
settingsABListsCustomAlreadyExists.message: Ad Block list '$URL$' is already included into the default lists selected.

settingsABListsCustomBadURL.description: The error message shown when a custom Ad Blocker list is not a valid URL
settingsABListsCustomBadURL.message: Ad Block list '$URL$' is not a valid URL

settingsABListsCustomDesc.message:
The Ninja is able to load Ad Block lists from wherever you want.

Feel free to add lists from the community or your own lists here.

Please be aware that Ninja Cookie can only handle cosmetics rules at the moment : its goal isn't to be yet another ad blocker.

settingsABListsCustomLoadError.description: The error message shown when a custom Ad Blocker list loading fails
settingsABListsCustomLoadError.message: Ad Block list '$URL$' could not be loaded

settingsABListsDefaultDesc.message:
By default, the Ninja will use a predefined set of Ad Block lists :

  • Easylist Cookie List
  • I don't care about cookies

These lists have been chosen for their efficiency. You can disable them and chose your own lists.

settingsABListsDesc.message: The Ninja doesn't know how to handle all the cookie banners (yet!). During its training, it is possible to use Ad Block lists to hide the cookie banner he doesn't know about.

settingsABListsEnabled.message: Enable alternative lists as complement of Ninja Cookie lists

settingsABListsEnabledDesc.message: Enable/Disable the use of Ad Block lists.

settingsDebugDesc.message: These debug options are for very advanced users. They allow you to monitor Ninja Cookie's actions via the console.

settingsLicenseDesc.message:
Ninja Cookie is free and we want to keep it that way. This is why you can get extra features for a small fee or even for free!

If you like what we're doing, please consider subscribing to a paid license key. Otherwise you can always get a 30-days free license key.

settingsLicenseKeyDesc.message: Add your Premium license key here

settingsLicenseKeyError.description: The message shown after a license key has been added but is not active
settingsLicenseKeyError.message: The license key '$LICENSE$' has been set but is not active.

settingsLicenseKeyRemoved.message: To disable your subscription, go to the Ninja Cookie website

settingsLiveDesc.message: Show/Hide what the Ninja is doing when working on a cookie banner.

settingsNCListsCustomAlreadyExists.description: The error message shown when a custom Ninja Cookie list is already in the default lists
settingsNCListsCustomAlreadyExists.message: Ninja Cookie list '$URL$' is already included into the default lists selected.

settingsNCListsCustomBadURL.description: The error message shown when a custom Ninja Cookie list is not a valid URL
settingsNCListsCustomBadURL.message: Ninja Cookie list '$URL$' is not a valid URL

settingsNCListsCustomDesc.message:
The Ninja is able to load rules lists from wherever you want.

You can also write your own rules. Check the documentation for more information. Adding community rules lists will be possible soon.

settingsNCListsCustomLoadError.description: The error message shown when a custom Ninja Cookie list loading fails
settingsNCListsCustomLoadError.message: Ninja Cookie list '$URL$' could not be loaded

settingsNCListsDefaultDesc.message:
By default, the Ninja will use predefined lists of rules.

A new rule is release in 'Beta' list, then 'Release Candidate' list and finally in 'Stable' list. It gives the developers some time to improve and verify that each new rule is working properly before sending it to all the users.

If you want to help improve the new rules or if you want to have the latest rules and you don't mind encountering few bugs, feel free to change your default lists.

settingsNCListsDesc.message: The Ninja uses a list of rules that explains how to handle cookie banners. These lists are downloaded and updated automatically.

settingsResetConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset your settings? All custom settings will be lost.

settingsStickerDesc.message: Show/Hide the status sticker displayed every time the Ninja is working on a cookie banner. The toolbar icon will still change based on status and extra information can still be obtained by clicking on the toolbar icon.

settingsStickerPositionDesc.message: Chose where the sticker will be displayed on the page.

settingsSubscriptionABListsCustom.description: The message shown after a Ad Blocker custom list has been added through subscription process
settingsSubscriptionABListsCustom.message:
The Ad Block list '$URL$' is being added.
Press 'Save' before exiting or any modification will be lost.

settingsSubscriptionLicenseKey.description: The message shown after a license key has been added through subscription process
settingsSubscriptionLicenseKey.message:
The license key '$LICENSE$' is being set.
Press 'Save' before exiting or any modification will be lost.

settingsSubscriptionNCListsCustom.description: The message shown after a Ninja Cookie custom list has been added through subscription process
settingsSubscriptionNCListsCustom.message:
The Ninja Cookie list '$URL$' is being added.
Press 'Save' before exiting or any modification will be lost.

settingsSubscriptionSubtitle.description: The message shown under the license info
settingsSubscriptionSubtitle.message: Subscribe to Ninja Cookie Premium features from $AMOUNT$/month!

settingsTrustAllDesc.message: If you are using custom rules lists, they may need to run small scripts to do their job. You will be asked whether you trust their origin before running them. Activating this option will assume that you trust them all. This is dangerous and can lead to security breaches. Use with caution.

settingsWhitelistAddDesc.message: Add here the domain you want to add to the whitelist using the following format: ***.com

settingsWhitelistAlreadyExists.description: The error message displayed when trying to add domain already in the list
settingsWhitelistAlreadyExists.message: Domain '$DOMAIN$' is already in the whitelist.

settingsWhitelistBadDomain.description: The error message displayed when trying to add an invalid domain name

settingsWhitelistDesc.message: Add/Remove a domain name to the whitelist

    <your idea here>

Please consider it.
Regards,

unknownAction.description: An unknown action type is executed

urlBadParameter.message: Bad parameter provided to URL matching action.

warningReportMessage.description: The default warning message displayed in the report form
warningReportMessage.message:
Dear Ninja Cookie support,

I came across a website with a badly setup cookie banner.
Here are the technical information you need :
    URL: $URL$
    Version: $VERSION$
    User-Agent: $USERAGENT$
    Matched rule(s): $MATCHED$

warningStatus.description: The text status when Ninja Cookie has hidden automatically a cookie banner. > Orange Dot
warningStatus.message: Cookie banner has been detected and hidden automatically.

warningStatusAlt.description: The warning status alternative text > Orange dot

warningStatusDesc.description: The description of the message displayed when a cookie banner is detected but Ninja Cookie does not know how to set it up. The cookie banner is  hidden with the alternative rules. > Orange dot
warningStatusDesc.message:
Ninja Cookie has detected a cookie banner on this web page but doesn't know how to set it up.
It has been hidden by using the alternative rule lists. You can disable this in the settings.
